QuestData.Title: Smoke Before Fire
QuestData.Description: Sully scouted the Horde establishment to the north, and he reports seeing a large pile of explosives, along with a small force of demolishers. That's not to mention the demons that their warlocks have summoned.$b$bLuckily, we came prepared. We've got air support from the Skyfire. We just need to show our pilots where to strike.$b$b<Rell hands you a smoke flare, and gives you a knowing nod.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Alliance Flare to call in an airstrike on the Pile of Munitions, the Twinspire Demolishers, the Wild Imps, and Xhu'daggab.
QuestData.CompletionText: What's that you've got, $glad:lass;? Some kind o' flare?$b$bShoot, I coulda put together a better flare'n that in half a wink, if Rell had only asked.
QuestData.RewardText: Me lads up in the sky bring the heat, don't they? Ha ha ha!
